channel.title: Happy Thanksgiving
channel.description:
I have been wanting to do this for the past couple days for some odd reason. To me, Thanksgiving is a special time of the year to be caring and nice. I just want to say....... HAPPY THANKSGIVING! I hope everyone has a good dinner to eat and stays friendly. Even though there is a topic out there already about this, I wanted to make my own one. And again, please, have a good time tonight and don't make it a bad one! =)
Please post about want you guys are going to do for Thanksgiving. I, myself, am right now, in New York City on vacation. Got out of school two days early to fnd out I wasn't leaving till the next day lol. I lied, I am in Jersy, and I am going to go to New York everday till I come back. So I just like to say I am in New York. I am hoping to se amazing places here and I am going to see a play! =( I knew I was going to , but I wish I didn't. Happy........ well you know!
"(_)" ~~ []

item.title: Happy Thanksgiving
item.dc:creator: @novalye Novalye
item.description:
@novalye wrote:

Casey.:

Sisters are coming down from nyc, gonna go to dinner with family I guess.

Have a good time with your sisters. I am an only child so i don’t have any brother or sisters to deal with. It gets lonely sometimes =(

eVokki`:

Thanksgiving is for obese Americunts to eat more.
